methods.name: public Object getObject() throws SecurityException
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the guarded object, or throws an exception if access
     * to the guarded object is denied by the guard.
     *
     * @return the guarded object.
     *
     * @exception SecurityException if access to the guarded object is
     * denied.

methods.name: private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos) throws java.io.IOException
methods.comment:
* Writes this object out to a stream (i.e., serializes it).
     * We check the guard if there is one.

methodNames: private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos) throws java.io.IOException
